entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
